credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: rrrrrr-rammelen komt bij bruynzeeldeuren nooit voor, october 1936
provenance: Reinhold Brown Gallery, New York, NY
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, mounted on blue blotting paper
description: Blue and red typography superimposed on two yellow oar-shaped paddles. Lower case rr's printed in blue and yellow (possibly to simulate the sound of a saw) at upper left. Calendar printed in yellow at lower left. The blotter/calendar was a promotional object intended for the clients of the door manufactory. When the month indicated on the blotter ended, the blotter could be mounted on a manual rocking blotter holder, one of a number of assorted objects in a professional desk set.
name: Blotter
